alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 5:43PM CDT until April 27 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... Central Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 543 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tibbee, or near West Point, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 555 PM CDT. Columbus around 605 PM CDT. Columbus AFB around 610 PM CDT. Steens around 620 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
